description: This file defines API routes related to metrics, including endpoints for retrieving metrics summary and timeseries data for specific instances in a performance monitoring backend.

methods.name: MetricsSummary get_metrics_summary(request: Request, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"))
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve a metrics summary snapshot for a specific instance.

methods.name: TimeseriesResponse get_metrics_timeseries( request: Request, payload: TimeseriesRequest, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"), )
methods.description: Handles POST request to fetch timeseries data for a specific instance based on provided parameters.

ctags.name: get_metrics_summary
ctags.pattern: /^def get_metrics_summary(request: Request, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance ide/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"))

ctags.name: get_metrics_timeseries
ctags.signature: ( request: Request, payload: TimeseriesRequest, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"), )
